name: Doom Planet
description:
Modification made were as follows:-

  1. Menu page modified with background, cursor and icons
  2. Infinite Enemy spawner for all different types of enemies (you need to kill 100 of them to win the game)
  3. environment change with small and big asteroids randomly all over the map

Both WebGL version to play in browser and windows version to download has been added

Made by Jaskirat Singh
